short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatterBox adds the ability to view, and add comments to sites that don't usually have comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatterBox allows you to view and add comments on numerous sites, starting with daft.ie, myhome.ie, and donedeal.ie.
